metadata.dc:author: García-Sancho Martín, Luis
metadata.dc:description: Acute appendicitis is a very frequent disease. Anyhow, this disease hasn't been well either known or treated until the last XIX century and has been a true plague for men. In this paper we expose the most important steps in the long way that we have roved until reaching the present treatment of this entity.
metadata.dc:title: La apendicitis aguda: su influencia en la historia de la humanidad.
[Acute appendicitis: its influence on human kind history].
metadata.dc:publisher: Anales de la Real Academia Nacional de Medicina
